DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , pharmacokinetics effectiveness single dose IV peramivir compare standard 5 day course oral oseltamivir treatment pediatric subject acute uncomplicated influenza . Two third participant receive peramivir , one third receive oseltamivir .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , PK Effectiveness IV Peramivir Versus Oseltamivir Pediatric Subjects With Uncomplicated Influenza
